data.title: Indiana Music Encyclopedia
data.text:
Assigning music by genre is a subjective task. Music is grouped on this site by:

Country and Bluegrass

Easy Listening (Instrumental, Pop Vocal, New Age, Lounge)

Fine Arts (Classical/Opera/Theatrical)

Folk and Acoustic

Jazz, Big Band and Swing

Rock (Many Subgenres)

Rhythm and Blues (Doo-op, Soul, Funk, Blues and Hip Hop/Rap)

Other Genres (Various Smaller Genres)

This method was chosen after considerable trial and error, and recognition of our own limitations. For example, we are relatively knowledgeable about rock music, but less so with country, where bluegrass could be separated, and jazz, where big band and swing could be separated, with jazz itself encompassing fusion, bop, and other sub-genres. So in the interest of accuracy we have kept those genres broad, for now.

Note: some artists fit more than one genre or sub-genre, and are so categorized.
